name: SINTEF Ventures
description: SINTEF has developed venture funds, the latest of which is called SINTEF Venture VI Fund. It will manage a capital of some €50 million, of which EIF is investing some €20 million. This substantial investment aims to promote the creation of 10-15 new companies, leveraging SINTEF’s tradition of pioneering technological innovations. The EIF also invested in SINTEF’s previous funds – EIF invested €10 million in 2014 and increased to €15 million in 2018. Fund’s latest investments: Cartesian AS – Offers heating and cooling solutions by storing and extracting thermal energy from phase change materials. MoreScope – Provides a data-driven platform for companies and investors to use to quantify climate impact, carbon footprint and avoided emissions. Sonair – Offers a 3D ultrasonic sensor for robots. Mia Health – Offers a solution that gives individuals and companies easy and precise insight into the actual health benefits of the activity in which they are involved.
investmentAreas: life sciences, clean energy, ICT

name: Construct Venture
description: Construct Venture is a NOK 80M joint fund between AF Gruppen and OBOS making investments in building and construction industry.Construct Venture is an early-phase investor in ConstructionTech and PropTech, providing smart capital and industry expertise for global growth.
investmentAreas: Corporate Ventur Capital, Early stage, Investment Management
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Equinor Technology Ventures
description: Equinor is an energy company that is engaged in the exploration, development, and production of oil and gas, as well as wind and solar power. It also sells crude oil and is a major supplier of natural gas, with activities in processing, refining, and trading. Its activities are managed through eight business areas, staff and support divisions, and has operations in North and South America, Africa, Asia, Europe and Oceania, and Norway.
investmentAreas: Technology, Deep water, Oil and gas, Offshore wind, Solar
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Eviny Ventures
description: Eviny Ventures is the venture fund of the Eviny Group, which invests in start-up and growth companies that think new and have the potential to play a key role in the renewable society of the future. Eviny Ventures is an active early stage investor in companies with great potential that help accelerate the transformation towards a sustainable future. We are hands-on with founders, from seed to venture to growth. As you drive your business forward, we’ll help you prepare for the biggest possible outcomes by leveraging our solid expertise and network from 100+ years in the renewable energy industry.
investmentAreas: Investment, Renewable energy, Private Equity Principals, Industrial investor
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Agder Energi Venture
description: Agder Energi Venture AS is the venture capital arm of Agder Energi AS specializing in seed, early, mid and late venture investments. The firm prefers to invest in companies operating in the energy sector based in Norway but will also consider making investments in international companies. Agder Energi AS was founded in 2007 and is based in Kristiansand, Norway.
investmentAreas: Angel Investment, Venture Capital, Utilities, Renewable energy, Utilities
